short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick access to your recently copied text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clipps is a handy little tool that lets you access your recent clipboard history. It works just like your regular clipboardâ€”a temporary storage place for text, but with the added feature of storing up to 25 recent items. Clipps ignores password fields and history is deleted every time you close your browser.

To view your clipboard history, simply right-click anywhere or click on the extension icon. If you want to use any item from your history, just click on it to copy it back to your clipboard.
